title: Pair of Tiles
description: Square tiles of reddish buff clay with bottle-green glaze over incised sejant lions (?). A. -facing right; B. -facing left. Faintly visible stamped on back: double wings surrounded by "W. De. Morgan 2 Co Sand's End Pottery"
name: Pair of Tiles
